summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 19, Laurelhurst Heights Addition, as condemned by Ordinance No. 46859, from 51st Avenue Northwest to a point 25 feet southwest of the southwest line of lot 15 of said block by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 9046 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
